Enter your vote today!  A new poll has been created for the 
nbwrpg group:

What would yall do if I had posted this 
right after Jet V and Artemis arrive in 
the ship. Is this a good entrance for 
the Technobots.

Computron walks in. He begins to 
speak. "Datem: You are wearing autobot 
symbols. Datem: You are in a clasified 
autobot area. Datem: The computer 
recognizes you. Datem: I have met all 
of you before. Datem: You both look 
fun. Datem: You speak kindly. Datem: I 
know you both quite well. Conclusion: 
you are Decepticons. You must die. 
Method: Acid Pellet blasts, ten fold." 
Computron holds out his two massive 
guns, and aims them at Jet V and 
Artemis. He pulls the trigger 276 
times, and kill Jet V and Artemis, in a 
pool of hot and disgusting 
slag. "Datem: Death was quick. Datem: 
Usage of all ammo. Datem: They did not 
put up a fight. Conclusion: 95% chance 
I was wrong. I just killed two 
comerades. Conclusion: Rearm myself, 
point guns at my head, pull the 
trigger. Result: 98.76555555% chance it 
will result in termination of 
Computron" computron reloads his 
weapons, and points both at his head. 
He then pulls the trigger 276 times, 
resulting in total melt down. He dead. 

  o Rad, stick with it jer 
  o Jer, we are all dumber for reading that 
  o lets beat him with the stupid stick (although he dosent need it) 
  o Oh my god, I am quitting because of that 
  o you da man jer, you da man 


To vote, please visit the following web page:

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/nbwrpg/polls 

Note: Please do not reply to this message. Poll votes are 
not collected via email. To vote, you must go to the Yahoo! Groups 
web site listed above.

Thanks!
